thread.title: SPECIAL ANALYSIS: Russia, America’s Proxy Against Israel
thread.title_full: SPECIAL ANALYSIS: Russia, America’s Proxy Against Israel

title: SPECIAL ANALYSIS: Russia, America’s Proxy Against Israel
text:
28 SPECIAL ANALYSIS: Russia, America’s Proxy Against Israel 
Homeland Security Today: President Obama’s insistence on negotiating a nuclear treaty with Iran was opposed at virtually every turn by most experts on the subject. The majority of the United States Congress opposed it, as did most Americans. In fact, there was relatively little support for it, even in Iran.
